context.task_title: Remove deprecated EventLog and GoTProjectManager classes

data.instructions:
## Handoff: Deprecated Class Removal Complete

### What Was Done
Task T-20251222-145525-445df343 has been COMPLETED. Removed ~2,500 lines of deprecated code:
- EventLog (~762 lines) - append-only event log persistence
- HandoffManager (~114 lines) - handoff operations via EventLog
- GoTProjectManager (~1,473 lines) - main API using event-sourced backend
- TaskMigrator (~90 lines) - migration from file-based tasks

### Architecture Now
TX (transactional) backend is the only storage option:
- User action → GoTManager.create_task() → .got/entities/T-xxx.json
- Startup → GoTManager.load() → Direct entity loading (fast)

### Test Results
- 8,764 tests passed, 12 skipped
- All GoT CLI commands work
- Reasoning demo works correctly

### Knowledge Transfer Document
See: samples/memories/2025-12-24-session-knowledge-transfer-deprecated-class-removal.md

### What NOT to Reintroduce
1. Event-sourced persistence - TX backend is now the only option
2. EventLog class - Use GoTManager from cortical/got/api.py
3. GoTProjectManager - Use GoTBackendFactory.create() or TransactionalGoTAdapter

### Key Commits
- 4333dd08 - Remove deprecated classes
- 1af05a4e - Knowledge transfer document
- b6f2995d - Task completion

### Next Session Can
- Work on other tasks
- Create new features
- The codebase is in a clean, working state
